casebody.data:
L.E. and P.T., Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
The PLAINFIELD PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICT, Plainfield Board of Education, Ann Nettingham, Angela Bento and Anna Belin-Pyles, Defendants/Third-Party Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
A.D. and R.B., Third-Party Defendants. C-667 September Term 2018
082013 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 8, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003638-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
